uk.ac.glasgow.jagora

Interface Market


  • public interface Market
    Defines behaviour for trading in a single stock type.
    Author:
    tws

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelBuyOrder(BuyOrder buyOrder)
      Removes the specified buy order (if present) from the order book for this market.
      void cancelSellOrder(SellOrder sellOrder)
      Removes the specified sell order (if present) from the order book for this market.
      java.util.List<TickEvent<Trade>> doClearing()
      Performs clearing on the current buy and sell order books for this market by executing all possible trades.
      java.lang.Double getBestBid() 
      java.lang.Double getBestOffer() 
      Stock getStock()

    • Method Detail

      • getStock

        Stock getStock()

      • doClearing

        java.util.List<TickEvent<Trade>> doClearing()
        Performs clearing on the current buy and sell order books for this market by executing all possible trades. Clearing will proceed whilst the market is able to match compatible buy and sell orders.
        Returns:
        an ordered (by execution) list of tick events for the trades that occurred during this round of clearing.

      • placeBuyOrder

        void placeBuyOrder(BuyOrder buyOrder)
        Enters the specified buy order onto the order book for this market. The order will persist on the market until it is filled during clearing or cancelled.
        Parameters:
        buyOrder -

      • placeSellOrder

        void placeSellOrder(SellOrder sellOrder)
        Enters the specified sell order onto the order book for this market. The order will persist on the market until it is filled during clearing or cancelled.
        Parameters:
        sellOrder -

      • cancelBuyOrder

        void cancelBuyOrder(BuyOrder buyOrder)
        Removes the specified buy order (if present) from the order book for this market.
        Parameters:
        buyOrder -

      • cancelSellOrder

        void cancelSellOrder(SellOrder sellOrder)
        Removes the specified sell order (if present) from the order book for this market.
        Parameters:
        sellOrder -

      • getBestBid

        java.lang.Double getBestBid()
        Returns:
        the price of the highest buy order currently on this market, or null if the market has no bids.

      • getBestOffer

        java.lang.Double getBestOffer()
        Returns:
        the price of the lowest sell order currently on this market, or null if the market has no offers.
